## Point.getTag() method

Gets value of tag with given name. Returns undefined if tag not found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTag(name: string): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | tag name |

**Returns:**

string \| undefined

tag value or undefined
